rows.label: tlk4440008903_msg0001
rows.name:
Bathing in spring waters, how
the bright droplets glint and
sparkle in the sunlight...

rows.label: tlk4440008903_msg0002
rows.name:
Ahh... If only he would leap out
of the pages and whisk me away...

rows.label: tlk4440008903_msg0003
rows.name:
Something wrong? You look
concerned. What? A lady
can dream, can't she?
